name: SpeechRecognition.continuous
description: The continuous property of the SpeechRecognition interface controls whether continuous results are returned for each recognition, or only a single result.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The continuous property of the SpeechRecognition interface controls whether continuous results are returned for each recognition, or only a single result.

It defaults to single results (false.)
